Retrospective.subtitle: Quarterly retrospectives organized as a timeline. (since 2022)

3Q.title: Tried building an API Developer site
3Q.details: Cleared legacy and developed user/admin tools providing APIs
3Q.extra1: 1. Experienced documentation system from basics to deployment using Docusaurus
3Q.extra2: 2. Completed the first design system and applied it to a real project
3Q.extra3: 3. Completed a job change and wrapped up tasks

2Q.title: Focused on monorepo and design system
2Q.details: Introduced a monorepo for repository management and applied it to the design system
2Q.extra1: 1. Started managing internal packages with AWS CodeArtifact.
2Q.extra2: 2. Began managing a monorepo via PNPM Workspaces.
2Q.extra3: 3. Prepared a design system and progressed projects in parallel.

1Q.title: Focused on writing and prepared to learn new tech
1Q.details: Finished manuscript revision and began learning Elixir in earnest
1Q.extra1: 1. Absorbing Elixir through seminars and Exercism.

4Q.title: As a lead, organized processes.
4Q.details: Built rational processes and put effort into automating repetitive tasks
4Q.extra1: 1. Conducted internal projects based on a browser-based media editor in development
4Q.extra2: 2. Established code review processes and striving to enforce them.
4Q.extra3: 3. Doing my best to be a good mentor

3Q.title: Finding a path between schedule and people management
3Q.details: Learning lead responsibilities from my lead and working to become a good lead
3Q.extra1: 1. Developing a browser-based media editor (open source)
3Q.extra2: 2. Building backend knowledge using Supabase, etc.
3Q.extra3: 3. Striving to become a good mentor or lead

2Q.title: Took frontend lead, moving towards senior developer
2Q.details: Working on people and schedule management, seeking specialization
2Q.extra1: 1. Writing tests, doing code reviews, and running a study.
2Q.extra2: 2. Exploring the path to become a web audio expert.

1Q.title: Non-technical prep to become a better developer
1Q.details: Started code reviews, studied to be a good mentor, and prepared for book publication
1Q.extra1: 1. Introduced code reviews with a junior colleague and applied automation via Bitbucket.
1Q.extra2: 2. Studying to become a good mentor developer.
1Q.extra3: 3. Received a book publication offer and started preparing.

4Q.title: Added proficiency in existing tech rather than new ones
4Q.details: Focused on organizing the stack and deepening understanding of existing tech.
4Q.extra1: 1. Deepened understanding of React and Next, and refactored existing projects.
4Q.extra2: 2. Maintaining a Flutter project to improve stability.

3Q.title: Gained confidence in audio domain development.
3Q.details: Completed internalization of the core library (Waveform-playlist) and became an open-source contributor (wavesurfer).
3Q.extra1: 1. Completed internalization of Waveform-playlist and proceeding with added features and advancements.
3Q.extra2: 2. Became an open-source contributor to Wavesurfer.
3Q.extra3: 3. Launched a service with Flutter and improving it based on user feedback.

2Q.title: Tried many fire-starting attempts to survive the winter.
2Q.details: A very busy quarter from planning to implementation and launch
2Q.extra1: 1. Launched Gaudio Studio-pro. A service I built started earning money.
2Q.extra2: 2. Picked up Flutter again for a side project.

1Q.title: Entered wintering, challenged to survive with technology
1Q.details: Started developing a core library (Web Audio) and handled large files in the browser.
1Q.extra1: 1. Improved Waveform-playlist library (TS/React support, large file optimization)
1Q.extra2: 2. Implemented automated data collection tools for AI models (using Puppeteer) - collected 100GB
1Q.extra3: 3. Launched a project with ChakraUI, Framer Motion, and TailwindCSS

4Q.title: Started laying the groundwork for various services at Gaudio Lab
4Q.details: Implemented various services and demo sites based on trust.
4Q.extra1: 1. Performed optimizations for audio and large data.
4Q.extra2: 2. Made structure changes and responsive support for the existing website for mobile.

3Q.title: Worked to become a trustworthy colleague after changing jobs
3Q.details: Migrated existing projects and learned the tech stack; a critical time to earn trust
3Q.extra1: 1. Completed migration from class components to function components
3Q.extra2: 2. Introduced Next and improved data fetching with React Query

2Q.title: Prepared to change jobs and wrapped up projects
2Q.details: Updated portfolio, went to interviews, finished current work and focused on documentation.
2Q.extra1: 1. Moved from Tmax to Gaudio Lab
2Q.extra2: 2. Wrapped up handover and organized work

1Q.title: Decided to change jobs and tried modern stacks like Next.js and Recoil
1Q.details: Tried to step out of the old stack and explore various libraries and frameworks.
1Q.extra1: 1. Started a side project to learn modern tech (Next.js)
1Q.extra2: 2. Prepared for job change, updated portfolio, and prepared for interviews
